vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People from Caphtor (Crete) of the Egyptians, first mentioned at Gen.10.14; descended from Egypt (H4714); along with Ludim (H3866), Anamim (H6047), Lehabim (H3853), Naphtuhim (H5320), Pathrusim (H6625) and Casluhim (H3695)
§ Caphtorim = see Caphtor "a crown"
Cretans as the inhabitants of Caphtor as distinct from the Philistines
vocabInfos._es_Definition: habitantes de Caftor; descendientes de Misraim
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
迦斐託人 这个形容詞 種族名稱在原文的意思是 參見迦斐託"一個冠冕"
克利特島人, 是迦斐託島的居民, 毫無疑問的是源自非利士人
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
迦斐托人 这个形容词 种族名称在原文的意思是 参见迦斐托"一个冠冕"
克利特岛人, 是迦斐托岛的居民, 毫无疑问的是源自非利士人
